info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 30 at 3:14PM CDT until May 1 at 9:35PM CDT by NWS Norman OK
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Norman OK has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oklahoma...
Cottonwood Creek at Guthrie affecting Logan County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Cottonwood Creek at Guthrie.
* WHEN...From this evening to late tomorrow evening.
* IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Bottomland residences and businesses in town may be flooded as deep as 3 feet. Rural flood plain areas near Guthrie could experience similar depths. Floodwaters close 5th Street near the Oklahoma State Highway 33 bridge.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. At 1:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was estimated at 19.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The Cottonwood Creek is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 23.0 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE TOMORROW EVENING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY
